title: Mohammad Hoseini
text:
I am an associate professor of economics affiliated to Institute for Management and Planning Studies and Tehran Institute for Advanced Studies.
I obtained my PhD in Economics from Tilburg University, the Netherlands.
Download CV

title: Research
text:

Value-Added Tax, Input-Output Linkages, and Informality, Economica, Volume 87, Issue 347, July 2020, Pages 813-843. download link
Trade Credit and Access to Finance of Retailers in Ethiopia, with Thorsten Beck and Burak Uras, Journal of African Economies, Volume 29, Issue 2, March 2020, Pages 146–172. download link
Finance, Law, and Poverty: Evidence from India, with Meghana Ayyagari and Thorsten Beck, Journal of Corporate Finance, Volume 60, February 2020, 101515. Vox column summary, download link
